name: Religious
description: There is a higher power that you worship and pray to (e.g. Vishnu, Jesus Christ, Haile Selassie I).

name: Atheist
description: Mankind can do fine without religions (e.g. staunch atheist, humanist, secularist).

name: Scientific
description: Science has all the answers. Pick a particular aspect of interest (e.g. evolution, cryogenics, space exploration).

name: Fatalist
description: A belief in fate (e.g. karma, the class system, superstitious).

name: Society Member
description: Member of a society or secret society (e.g. Freemason, Women's Institute, Anonymous).

name: Crusader
description: There is evil in society that should be rooted out. What is this evil? (e.g. drugs, violence, racism).

name: Materialist
description: "Money is power, and I'm going to get all I can" (e.g. greedy, enterprising, ruthless).

name: Activist
description: Campaigner/Activist (e.g. feminism, equal rights, union power).
